Computer.name: HW Server Farm #206
Computer.file:
HINT: I hope that you are keeping track about those other passwords too, and not just the ones that actually work...
Also might be worth taking note of the actual working passwords too.
Computer.encryptedFile:
Congratulation on breaking the encryption of the second file. You're 2/3 of the way there now, you've gotta crack just one more...
Your next set of passwords are: (once again, without the quotation marks) - "cook1e" - "cr4y0n" - "sund14l"
